definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: excellence (NH id., choice fruit ; Syr. magd0 fruit ; Ar. majdun glory, honour, nobility);—´[[מ]] cstr. De 33:13 + 4 t. De 33; pl. [[מְגׇדִים]] Ct So 4:13, So 7:13; sf. [[מְגׇדָיו]] Ct So 4:16—excellence: excellent or choice things; always of gifts of nature: [[שָׁמַיִם]] ´[[מ]] De 33:13 i.e. (natural) gifts of heaven; [[תְּבוּאׂת שֶׁמֶשׁ]] ´[[מ]] v:De 33:14; [[גֶּרֶשׁ יְרָחִים]] ´[[מ]] v:De 33:14; [[גִּבְעוֹת עוֹלָם]] ´[[מ]] v:De 33:15 (‖[[ראׁשׁ הַרֲרֵי קֶדֶם]]); [[אֶרֶץ וּמְלֽאָהּ]] ´[[מ]]; pl. abstr. ´[[פְּרִי מ]] (= excellent fruit) Ct So 4:13, So 4:16; ´[[מ]] alone = foreg., So 7:13.
